name: The First Plant on Mars
description:
CONTROLS: RIGHT AND LEFT ARROW KEYS

Collect water to stay alive and grow your score!

As humanity's hail mary last-ditch effort to save itself, it has abandoned Earth and headed or Mars. You play as the hyper genetically-modified seed that has pierced the red planet, weaving its roots into the martian soil to oxygenate the atmosphere before the humans arrive.

*Made as part of Global Game Jam 2023*
